pages.about: Spices & Crust About Us: Our Story - Discover the Heart of Culinary Fusion Thank you for visiting the Spices & Crust website. We would like to inform you that we use cookies to improve your browsing experience and provide personalized content. To the continue to use our website, you agree to the use of cookies in accordance with our Privacy Policy Accept Home Catalog About Contacts Spices & Crust About Us Meet the Team Behind the Fusion of Tradition and Innovation Our Roots In the heart of Pune, amidst its eclectic blend of ancient and modern, Spices & Crust found its first home in 2018. This was not just a location choice but a statement of intent. Our chosen spot, an enchanting cobblestoned lane within the city's historic district, encapsulates the spirit of our culinary philosophy: a fusion of time-honored traditions with a contemporary twist. This lane, alive with the stories of centuries, mirrors our approach to food - blending the rich, complex flavors of India with the timeless appeal of Italian pizza. The exterior of our café is as inviting as the flavors we create inside. Each hand-painted tile adorning our facade tells a story, a prelude to the culinary narrative awaiting our guests. This attention to detail and love for storytelling is woven into the very fabric of Spices & Crust, setting the stage for an immersive dining experience. The Atmosphere Upon entering Spices & Crust, guests are enveloped in an ambiance that whispers tales of faraway lands and homegrown traditions. The décor, a harmonious blend of rustic Italian elements and vibrant Indian aesthetics, serves as a backdrop to the culinary journey we offer. Vintage sari fabrics, repurposed as elegant drapes, flutter gently in the breeze, their colors vivid against the soft glow of ambient lighting. Local artwork adorns the walls, each piece a celebration of our rich cultural heritage and the artisanal skill of our community. The heart of our café is its garden view, a lush, verdant oasis that offers a tranquil respite from the urban rush. Here, under the canopy of twinkling lights, our guests can enjoy a moment of serenity, accompanied by the gentle symphony of nature and the distant echo of city life. Our Philosophy Spices & Crust is more than a café; it's a destination for those who seek to explore, to taste, and to connect. Our decision to focus exclusively on dine-in experiences stems from a belief in the power of food to bring people together, to create moments of joy and discovery. In a world increasingly dominated by fast-paced living and impersonal interactions, we offer an oasis of warmth and genuine connection, a place where every meal is an occasion, and every visitor is a guest in our home. Our Team The soul of Spices & Crust is its team - a diverse group of individuals united by a shared passion for culinary innovation and exceptional hospitality. Our chefs, with their unique blend of traditional and contemporary expertise, are the alchemists behind our menu, transforming simple ingredients into extraordinary creations. Our service team, attentive and knowledgeable, ensures that every guest's experience is memorable, offering insights into the dishes served and the stories they tell. At the helm is our founder, a visionary with deep roots in Pune and a boundless love for both its culture and cuisines. It is this vision that inspires our team every day, driving us to experiment, to innovate, and to cherish the rich tapestry of flavors and stories that define our menu. Our Invitation We extend a heartfelt invitation to you to step into our world at Spices & Crust, to explore the stories etched into the cobblestones of our lane, to savor the fusion of flavors that defines our menu, and to be part of the continuing story of our café. Here, every visit is an adventure, every meal a journey, and every guest a friend we haven't met yet. Join us for an experience that promises not just to feed the body, but to nourish the soul. Welcome to Spices & Crust, where every bite tells a story, and every visit creates a new chapter. pages.catalog: Spices & Crust Pizzas: Discover Our Unique Fusion Pizza Menu Thank you for visiting the Spices & Crust website. We would like to inform you that we use cookies to improve your browsing experience and provide personalized content. To the continue to use our website, you agree to the use of cookies in accordance with our Privacy Policy Accept Home Catalog About Contacts Spices & Crust Pizzas: Our Pizza Menu A Culinary Fusion of Indian Spices and Classic Pizzas Welcome to the heart of our passion at Spices & Crust: our Pizza Menu. Here, tradition and innovation collide to create a culinary experience like no other. Our menu is a vibrant tapestry of flavors, each pizza crafted with care, creativity, and a touch of Indian flair. Discover the diversity of our offerings, from timeless classics reimagined with Indian spices to bold new creations that push the boundaries of pizza. Spicy Volcano 19$ Make an order Mexican Fiesta 17$ Make an order Italian Classics 18$ Make an order Hawaiian Paradise 12$ Make an order BBQ Miracle 15$ Make an order Cheese Fountain 14$ Make an order Vegetarian Oasis 15$ Make an order Sea Breeze 18$ Make an order Sharp Shine 11$ Make an order Pepperoni Fusion 16$ Make an order Margarita Royal 22$ Make an order Mushroom Delicacy 20$ Make an order Four Cheese Magic 18$ Make an order Spinach Person 17$ Make an order Bacon Love 14$ Make an order Olive Extravaganza 11$ Make an order Tuscan Dream 10$ Make an order French Perfection 12$ Make an order Country Style Blues 15$ Make an order Salmon Premium 14$ Make an order BBQ Chicken 22$ Make an order Caesar Authentic 13$ Make an order Artichoke Paradise 18$ Make an order Caribbean Wind 11$ Make an order Chocolate-fruit Fantasy 9$ Make an order Signature Indian Fusion Pizzas Masala Margherita: A revolutionary take on the classic Margherita, infused with a blend of traditional Indian spices and topped with fresh paneer, mozzarella, and a sprinkle of coriander. A fusion that brings the best of both worlds to your palate. Tandoori Chicken Pizza: Marinated tandoori chicken spread generously over a rich tomato base, adorned with red onions, mozzarella, and a drizzle of mint-coriander chutney. It’s a spicy, savory, and refreshing journey in every bite. Paneer Tikka Pizza: Succulent pieces of paneer tikka, bell peppers, and onions atop our signature sauce, garnished with mozzarella and a hint of chaat masala. It’s a vegetarian delight that’s bursting with flavor. Spicy Mango & Prawn Pizza: A daring blend of sweet and spicy, featuring juicy prawns, fresh mango slices, and a spicy sauce. Topped with mozzarella and finished with fresh cilantro, this pizza offers an unforgettable taste adventure. Classic Pizzas with a Twist Pepperoni Spice-Up: Our take on the classic pepperoni pizza, with a spicy twist. We add a special blend of Indian spices to the pepperoni, elevating the flavor profile and adding a kick that will keep you coming back for more Veggie Supreme: A colorful array of bell peppers, onions, mushrooms, and olives, enhanced with garam masala, making this classic veggie pizza anything but ordinary. Seasonal Specialties Our menu is ever-evolving, featuring seasonal specialties that celebrate the freshest ingredients of the moment. From the "Monsoon Delight," with its tangy assortment of pickled toppings, to the "Winter Warmth" pizza featuring roasted root vegetables and a spicy tomato base, there’s always something new to discover. Build Your Own Pizza For those who love to experiment, our Build Your Own Pizza option lets you become the chef. Choose from a variety of bases, sauces, cheeses, and an extensive selection of toppings including exotic vegetables, premium meats, and unique Indian ingredients. Create your own masterpiece and let your culinary creativity shine. Commitment to Quality At Spices & Crust, we are committed to using only the freshest, locally-sourced ingredients. Our dough is handmade daily, and our cheeses are sourced from local artisans, ensuring that every pizza not only tastes good but is good for you and the environment. Dive into a World of Flavors We invite you to dive into our world of flavors, where each pizza tells a story. Whether you’re in the mood for something familiar with a twist, or something completely out of the ordinary, our menu has something to satisfy every craving. Experience the joy of discovery, the warmth of our hospitality, and the unparalleled taste of our pizzas. At Spices & Crust, every pizza is a journey. Join us on this delicious adventure, and let your taste buds explore the rich, complex, and vibrant flavors of India, one slice at a time.
